plot: Observational documentary following the daily routine of a high altitude shepherdess of the Andes. Benita and her herd of llamas and goats under the deep blue sky and the impassive scrutiny of the Tuzgle volcano. Her days go by between mountains and clouds, prayers and rituals, stones and silence.
title: Pastora de nubes
plot_es: Observational documentary following the daily routine of a high altitude shepherdess of the Andes.
